security: Revealing the intention to hold off travel by a CIA officer pending developments could alert hostile parties to ongoing operations or personnel movements. Quoting directly: 'PENDING DEVELOPMENTS, CIA OFFICER PLANS RETURN HOS AFTER STOP. THEREFORE BEST HOLD OFF TRAVEL.'
summary: A cable discusses matters related to a Cuban defector and a Salvadoran asset, including arrangements made with "NIGHT" (possibly a code name) and a decision to postpone travel plans for a CIA officer.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET cable references discussions with an individual referred to as "NIGHT" on September 8, regarding a Cuban defector and a Salvadoran asset. "NIGHT" concurred with arrangements made, including those involving "DALTON" and the solitary confinement of the Cuban defector. The cable also indicates that a CIA officer's planned return should be postponed pending further developments.
title: Cuban Defector and Salvadoran Asset Matters
